page.title: 13A Visit To Our Church
page.content:
There are two clocks.There is one at the front and one at the side.The clocks are outside and inside are the bells.On the top there is a weather- vane.Lisa and Simon's Mum ring the bells on Tuesday.
The roof was black.The windows were stained glass in the church at Beckbury.
We have a church to pray in and for the babies to get christened.We have a church for Sunday School.
Reverend Dorrington came to school to tell us to help poor people and to tell us to say thank you to people.Mr Dorrington showed us the cassock and the surplice.Mr Dorrington showed us his dog collar and he showed us the stole.
